phrases: In the days off we had after the sports festival,
we were to let our injuries recover,
and then we would start regular classes again today.
That is what I thought, but...
Good job at the sports festival!
You were in the top eight, right?
He is smaller than I expected.
He reminds me of when I was young.
Yeah, it is like he is trying really hard.
YOU.A. High School Sports Festival Katsuki Bakugo Wins First-Year Competition Final Results 1st - Katsuki Bakugo 2nd - Shoto Todoroki 3rd - Fumikage Tokoyami, Tenya Iida
It is only morning, but I am already tired.
Wearing a p-poncho and rain boots?
Why are you walking so slowly?
You are going to be late!
There are still five minutes until the first bell.
If it is about my brother, there is no need to worry.
I apologize for worrying you needlessly.
It is different when they broadcast the matches on TV after all, huh?
So many people talked to me on my way here!
People were staring at me, too.
Is not that normal for you, Hagakure?
I had some elementary schoolers suddenly tell me Do not worry about it.
After just one day, we have suddenly been thrust into the spotlight, huh?
Mr. Aizawa, your bandages are gone.
The old lady went overboard with her treatment.
More importantly, we are having a special hero informatics class today.
I am bad at laws relating to heroes and stuff like that...
You will be coming up with hero names.
We are going to do something exciting!
This is related to the pro hero draft picks I mentioned the other day.
The drafts begin in earnest in the second and third years,
after students have gained experience and can become immediate assets to the pros.
In other words, for them to extend offers to first years like you
shows that they are interested in your future potential.
These offers are often cancelled if that interest dies down by graduation.
So we will have to prove ourselves once we get picked, huh?
And here are the totals for those with offers.
Class A No. of Offers Todoroki Bakugo Tokoyami Iida
In other years, it is been more spread out, but all eyes were on these two this year.
Gah, there is such a big difference!
Those pros do not know a good thing when they see one!
It is the opposite of their placement in the sports festival.
Some people are too scared to ask for a guy who had to be restrained on the podium.
What are the pros scared of?!
They are probably all because of my dad.
Midoriya, you did not get any!
They are scared of you'because of the crazy way you were fighting.
Keeping these results in mind, whether or not anyone asked for you,
you will all be participating in internships with pros.
At USJ, you already got to experience combat with real villains,
but it will still be meaningful training for you to see pros at work firsthand.
So that explains the hero names!
Things are suddenly getting a lot more fun!
Well, those hero names are still temporary,
but if you are not serious about it...
Because a lot of hero names used by students become recognized by society,
and they end up becoming professional hero names!
Well, that is how it is.
So Midnight will be making sure your names are okay.
I cannot do stuff like that.
You have not decided on a hero name yet?
I do not want to be on the news, so I do not care what name I have.
I will go with that, then.
When you give yourself a name,
you get a more concrete image of what you want to be like in the future,
and you can get closer to it.
This is what it means when they say, Names and natures do often agree.
A name for what I want to be like in the future, huh?
Okay, let us start presenting names starting with those who are ready.
Man, that will take some nerve...
Which means, you cannot stop my sparkles!
It will be easier to use if you take out the I and shorten the can not to cannot.
Are you trying for the thing with acidic blood?
I would not if I were you!
Since the first ones were weird,
it feels like we are supposed to make them funny now!
I have had this in mind ever since I was in elementary school.
It is a great example of a name that everyone will love!
You have brought things back to normal!
You are paying homage to the Chivalrous Hero: Crimson Riot, right?
It is pretty old-fashioned, but the hero image I am going for is Crimson himself.
If you are bearing a name you admire, it will come with that much more pressure.
Your name after you become a hero?
I cannot decide which one to pick!
Mighty All Man, Mighty Boy, All Might, Jr.
Mighty Man, Captain All Might, Super All Might!
Now that I have been given his power and am under his care,
I see just how big a difference there is between us.
There is no way I can take on a name like that.
Man, I have not thought of a name yet...
Why do not I give you one?
It is like Hemingway, who wrote A Farewell to Arms!
It is because even though you are strong...
It is like tentacle with some octopus thrown in!
Charge + Lightning Bolt = Stun Gun Hero: Chargebolt
Stun Gun Hero: Chargebolt, combining charge with lightning bolt!
Come on, let us keep right on going!
I hope I will not bring shame to this name.
You probably should not use something like that.
This is what I thought of: Uravity.
Choosing hero names is going more smoothly than I thought it would!
All that is left is Bakugo, who needs to rethink his, and Iida.
I was not sure if I wanted to say anything yesterday,
but actually, I do not have any feeling in my legs.
The hero, Ingenium, will probably end here.
You still have so many more people to lead!
I do not like this either...
If you are up for it...
Will you take this name for me?
You are using your first name, too?
It is got to be... this.
Are you really okay with that?
You might be called that forever, you know.
I did not like this name until now.
But someone changed the meaning of it,
and that had a huge impact on me.
My Deku is not always going to mean useless!
Offers for the first years are still coming.
No, that is still no good.
Now that everyone is decided on their hero names,
we will go back to talking about the internships.
They will last for a week.
As for where you will have them,
those who had offers from pros will be given your own lists,
so you can choose from those yourself.
Those who did not have offers will choose
from among forty agencies around the country
that will be accepting our interns.
They all work in different places and have different specialties.
For example, Thirteen would be focused on rescues from accidents and disasters
I want to fight crime in urban areas!
I hope I can intern at a place with floods.
I wonder if there are any?
Turn in your choices before the weekend.
We have only got two days?!
Hey guys, have you decided what pro agency you are going to yet?
I am going to Mt. Lady!
Mineta, you are thinking about something perverted, are not you?
Ashido, you made it pretty far in the tournament, too.
It is weird that you did not get any offers.
There are only forty heroes who will take us,
so after looking up their specialties and splitting them into groups...
You are really thinking carefully about this, huh?
I got an offer from them!
I totally thought you were trying to be a hero like Thirteen.
But fighting Bakugo at the sports festival made me think-
The stronger I get, the more possibilities I will have!
If I only do what I want, I will have a narrower perspective!
More importantly, this has been bothering me for a while, but...
You are trembling, are not you?
It is the air chair exercise.
Do not tell me you do that all through class?
That is such an old-fashioned exercise.
The isometric muscle contraction of the air chair means
it is an easy way to train without moving!
I cannot stay the way I am.
I need to be able to control my Quirk more.
He who follows two hares catches neither.
Deku, let us go home together.
He probably decided on where he wants to do his internship
and went to turn it into the staff room.
Why are you in such a hurry?
Come with me for a moment.
Getting straight to the point, you have got an offer from a hero!
The hero's name is Gran Torino.
He was a teacher at YOU.A. for only one year.
The man who was my homeroom teacher.
He knows about One For All, too.
In fact, he probably asked for you because of that.
Wait, there was someone else who knew about the Quirk?
Gran Torino was the sworn friend of my predecessor.
He retired a long time ago, so I forgot to count him...
Was it because I wrote of you when I sent him the letter?
Or because he could not just stand by and watch my inadequate teaching...?
If he went so far as to use his old name to make an offer...
A-Anyway, it is my duty to train you,
but since you got an offer, you should go work to your heart's c-content-t-t-t...
Just how scary is this guy?!
Make sure they think about it properly.
There are some third years that still have regrets about it.
Class 1-A - Tenya Iida Desired Internship Agency First Choice: Hosu City, Tokyo - Normal Hero: Manual Agency
The agency Iida wants to go to...
I am sure he had offers from better places.
Did Iida go home before us?
I heard about what happened to Iida's big brother on the news.
The incident involving Ingenium in Hosu City, Tokyo.
The escaping culprit had already killed 17 heroes in the past
If it is about my brother, there is no need to worry.
I apologize for worrying you needlessly.
Iida did not say anything to me.
Later, I was surprised to find out that Iida's internship would be in Hosu City,
But I could not say anything to Iida, since he had not said anything to me.
And so things remained as we approached the first day of our internships.
You all have your costumes, right?
Remember, you are not allowed to wear them in public.
Do not drop them or anything.
Make sure you mind your manners with the heroes at your internships!
Tokoyami, you are going to Kyushu?
That is in the opposite direction.
If you ever feel hopeless, make sure you let us know.
At that time, I should have been more emphatic.
Because I would eventually regret what happened on that day.
A hero that even All Might is afraid of, huh?
I have never heard of him, but I am sure he is an amazing person!
I am sure he is an amazing person!
The address matches the one on the map...
I am here from YOU.A. High.
In order to do my internship, I have gone to the man who was once All Might's teacher,
I am Izuku Midoriya from YOU.A.!
I look forward to working with you this week!
There is no time, so I am going to keep going.
